title: Room for rent
posting_body: City View Apartments located in Hayward.
A luxurious apartment complex that offers studios, 1 bedroom, & 2 bedroom apartments.
This complex has 3 pools, tennis courts and a gym.
Rent will be $1375 with Wi-Fi and utilities not included.
Utilities can range anywhere from $70-$100.
Parking is also available but will be an additional $65.
Our lease will be up sometime in July and we are looking to move in with two other roommates who are LGBTQ friendly.
If you are a lone person who can afford this room space this would be perfect for you.
Our ideal roommate would be someone clean and respectful of our space.
Looking to room with someone between the ages of 23-28.
If you are a college student even better.
No overnight guests.
No pets.
Must have good credit and be respectful towards our space.
Due to Covid we are restricting as much visitors as possible.
If you have any visitors please let us know beforehand and please be respectful of the common spaces.
Living room is furnished.
Will have pictures available for bedroom as soon as our current roommates are out.
These pictures are of our current apartment.
If you are interested or have any questions please feel free to reach out.
About roommates:
Friendly (L)GBTQ couple aged 29 and 26 looking to find roommate(s) to help lease an apartment here at Cityview Apartments in Hayward.
We are very clean, respectful and friendly.
Also very 4/20 friendly.
We have a small and energetic morkie who is very playful.
He is also potty trained too.
Unfortunately we are not allowing any more pets.
We are looking for roommates who are respectful and are clean.
No overnight guests and parties.
